    • game

      public void game(javafx.scene.Scene gameScene, javafx.scene.Group root, javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage, javafx.scene.Scene endGameScene, javafx.scene.Group endGameRoot, javafx.scene.paint.Color fontColor, long highScore)

      Parameters:
      gameScene - This is a parameter use to set the Scene of GameScene
      root - This is a parameter use to set the Group of GameScene to show on scene
      primaryStage - This is a parameter use to set the Stage
      endGameScene - This is a parameter use to set the Scene of EndGame
      endGameRoot - This is a parameter use to set the Group of EndGame to show on scene
      fontColor - This is a parameter use to store the font color
      highScore - This is a parameter use to store the highest score of user

    • showEndGame

      private void showEndGame(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage, javafx.scene.Scene endGameScene, javafx.scene.Group endGameRoot, long score, javafx.scene.paint.Color fontColor, long high, boolean win)
      This is a method use to show the scene of EndGame
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - This is a parameter use to set the Stage
      endGameScene - This is a parameter use to set the Scene
      endGameRoot - This is a parameter use to set the Group to show on scene
      score - This is a parameter use to store score of user
      fontColor - This is a parameter use to store the font color
      high - This is a parameter use to store the highest tile score of user
      win - This is a parameter use to know whether user already win the game by reaching 2048
